name: bulma-start-muncie
description: Kevin Muncie's start package for Bulma
author: Kevin Muncie (http://kmuncie.com)

scripts.css-deploy: npm run css-build && npm run css-postcss
scripts.css-watch: npm run css-build && npm run css-build -- -wr
scripts.develop: npm run setup-dist && npm-run-all --parallel assets-watch html-watch css-watch js-watch css-postcss
scripts.generate: npm run clean && npm run setup-dist && npm run assets-copy && npm run html-build && npm run css-deploy && npm run js-build
